value:
$WmMPID_舞踏エスリン,ch06_15_Ethlin_F_Dance20,Face|Ah! How lovely you and your wife
look, Brother. Visions both.$k$p$WmMPID_比翼シグルド,ch06_04_Siglud_MF_Pair,Face|Thank you, Ethlyn. I should say
the same about you.$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏キュアン,ch06_14_Cuan_M_Dance20,Face|...Go on, Sigurd. Have you no kind
words for me?$k$p$WmMPID_比翼シグルド,ch06_04_Siglud_MF_Pair,Face|Quan! Of course, of course. Ever so
dashing, that outfit. It even manages
to improve the looks of its wearer!$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏キュアン,ch06_14_Cuan_M_Dance20,Face|Hah! Unable to help yourself, I see!
If not for this outfit, such talk would
be grounds to duel here and now!$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏エスリン,ch06_15_Ethlin_F_Dance20,Face|Brother! Quan! This is a ball.
Now, please. Control yourselves.$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏キュアン,ch06_14_Cuan_M_Dance20,Face|As you say, Ethlyn. We were only
having some fun, you understand.$k$p$WmMPID_ディアドラ,ch06_04_Siglud_MF_Pair,Face|Hee hee...$k$p$nMPID_比翼シグルド|Oh, how your laugh graces my ear,
my darling Deirdre! I'm sorry to keep
you waiting. Shall we go dance?$k$p$nMPID_ディアドラ|Lead the way, Lord Sigurd...$k$p

$WmMPID_舞踏ラケシス,ch06_02_Rackesis_F_Dance20,Face|Eldigan! There you are. Won't you
join us in the dancing festivities?$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏エルトシャン,ch06_01_Eltshan_M_Dance20,Face|Forgive me, Lachesis, but it seems
some unexpected guests have just
arrived. I must attend to them.$k$pFortunately, this type of dance
is likely to suit me better than
the ballroom sort.$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏エスリン,ch06_15_Ethlin_F_Dance20,Face|Allow me to assist you two!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_舞踏エスリン,ch06_15_Ethlin_F_Dance20,Face|That was too much for us alone...
Let's retreat and rendezvous
with Quan for support.$k$p$Sbs150|
